title: Airplane Message
alt: PHARAOH IRY-HOR, FROM THE 3100s BC, IS THE FIRST HUMAN WHOSE NAME WE KNOW.
transcript:
[There is a plane with a banner behind.]
Banner: Adriamycin, one of our most potent chemotherapy drugs, comes from the dirt from an Italian castle.My hobby: Breaking into airplane hangars and replacing the ads on their giant banners with cool facts.
